message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $12000 on it. Could you consider reducing the price to $10000?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a compromise at $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $11500 is still slightly out of my budget, I would like to propose $10500 as a potential price for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.

I'm still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you a price of $11000, which is the closest I can get to your target. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
